description: After the perfect side dish for Christmas? Try these roasted carrots scattered with almonds and cranberries and drizzled with a creamy yoghurt dressing.
keywords: Roast vegetable,Dec 2021,Pescatarian,Halal,Seafood free,Christmas,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Egg free,Quick & easy
name: Roasted Carrots With Almonds & Cranberries Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs Woolworths extra virgin olive oil
0.25 bunch mint, leaves picked, roughly chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200°C/180°C fan-forced. Line a baking tray with baking paper. Place carrot on tray and sprinkle over sumac and half of the cumin. Drizzle with oil and toss to coat. Season with pepper. Bake for 25 minutes or until golden and tender, adding almonds to tray in the last 5 minutes of cooking.
Meanwhile, place yoghurt, honey and remaining cumin in a small bowl and whisk to combine. Season with pepper.
Arrange carrot mixture on a tray. Top with cranberries and mint. Serve with yoghurt dressing.
